descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Astropark VR is an immersive and non-violent educational game that takes players on a hands-on journey through our Solar System. Designed for ages 13 and up, it transforms real-world science into interactive missions set on the Moon, Mars, Europa, and more.

Each mission introduces basic physics and astronomy concepts in a fun and intuitive way. Players collect solar energy, launch rockets, drive rovers, and solve environment-based puzzles using mechanics inspired by real space exploration. A friendly in-game AI guides the player, offering tips, motivation, and science facts along the way.

Astropark VR is ideal for classrooms, museums, and curious minds at home. Its mission-based gameplay is accessible and rewarding, with no violence or combat—just pure exploration and learning. The visuals are bright and stylized, and the controls are simple enough for beginners to enjoy.

Features:

Mission-based gameplay inspired by real planetary science

Explore the Moon, Mars, and Europa in detailed VR environments

Learn about energy, gravity, and motion through interactive mechanics

Playful, non-violent experience designed for education and fun

Guided by an AI companion that teaches and entertains

Great for students, families, and science lovers alike

Discover the joy of learning in space—Astropark VR turns science into an adventure.
